title: ExecuteMsg
description: This structure describes the execute messages of the contract.

oneOf.title: Description
oneOf.description: Receives a message of type [`Cw20ReceiveMsg`] and processes it depending on the received template.

oneOf.title: Description
oneOf.description: Bond bro tokens by providing ust amount.

oneOf.title: Description
oneOf.description: Updates contract settings ## Executor Only owner can execute this function

lp_bonding_discount.description: new discount percentage for lp bonding

lp_bonding_enabled.description: sets lp bonding option either to enabled or disabled

min_bro_payout.description: new minimum amount of bro to receive via bonding

ust_bonding_discount.description: new discount percentage for ust bonding

ust_bonding_reward_ratio.description: new distributed reward percentage for ust bonding balance

Binary.description:
Binary is a wrapper around Vec<u8> to add base64 de/serialization with serde. It also adds some helper methods to help encode inline.

This is only needed as serde-json-{core,wasm} has a horrible encoding for Vec<u8>

Cw20ReceiveMsg.description: Cw20ReceiveMsg should be de/serialized under `Receive()` variant in a ExecuteMsg

Decimal.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)
